release.action: PLDoc 1.5.19 cannot work with german umlauts and ÃŸ (esszet) characters
Parse OBJECT TYPE functions as PACKAGES
@link keyword bugs and improvement
Revert link generation for implicitly referenced Package Types owned by other schemas
Parse OBJECT TYPE functions as PACKAGES
URIencode schema names - cope with Oracle 12c Common Users (C## prefix)
Allow more flexible conditional compilation code; exclude objects in the recycle bin
Correct scraped source code suffix mapping for FUNCTIONs ('fns' to 'fnc')
Populate scraped source code with path to PLDoc; alter source stylesheet to generate link to related PLDoc
Strip BOM from UTF* InputStreams
Add Windows and Linux Drag and Drop scripts
PRAGMA INLINE(...) breaks parser
Allow Package and Type bodies to be EDITIONABLE
Avoid java.net.URISyntaxException in ResourceResolver on Windows platforms
Remove debug messages
Generate better links for types in other schemas using private synonyms
Generate landing links for PL/SQL RECORD types
Generate better links for types in other schemas
Make RELEASE an unreserved keyword
pldoc - update POM file to Sourceforge2 tracking
Make NULLIF and RENAME unreserved keywords
Correct 12C ACCESSIBLE BY clause for multiple accessors
Support 11G EDITIONABLE/NONEDITIONABLE objects
Support 12C ACCESSIBLE BY clause
Allow "DEFINE" SQL*plus keyword as unreserved keywordf within Pl/SQL
Generate valid XHTML for scraped sourcecode
Add links to CPD and maven-cpd-plugin projects, and to project news
Attempt to identify PROCEDURE and FUNCTION schema from source when parsing SQL scripts, defaulting to the traditional default (GLOBAL) when no schema is given
Whilst aggregating FUNCTIONs and PROCEDUREs in to _${SCHEMA} pseudo-packages, key is SCHEMA,NAME, rather than NAME
Output web pages to separate schema subdirectories, preventing overwritten HTML files when different schemas have objects with the same object name
Add CPD CSS settings to facilitate consistent PLDoc and PLDoc-CPD output documentation
Make PLScope dictionary views consistent with changes made in release 1.4.1 - attempt to use DBA_* dictionary view and revert to ALL_* views on error
Expose methods to create static CSS and XSL for downstream Maven projects
Make ANT task camelCase like showSkippedPackages
Allow trigger REFERENCING clause to have a minimum of ZERO sub-clauses
Support ANSI Date literals
Initially attempt to locate objects for processing from DBA_OBJECTS, falling back to ALL_OBJECTS on error
Correct infinite loop in SubstitutionReader for situation when the replacement text contains the search text
Add option to save database source code to file system for subsequent display using new "-savesourcecode" and "-sourcestylesheetfile" command-line flags
Add option to save database source code to file system for subsequent display using new "savesourcecode" and "sourcestylesheet" Ant task attributes
Correct generation of caller/callee information for standalone FUNCTIONs, PROCEDUREs and TRIGGERs
Convert "Calls:" and "Called From": sections into links

release.description: Include PLScope call information; support Java
release.action: pom.xml - add PMD as dependency
Add support for extracting and merging PLScope calling information in PLDoc
Add support for parsing CREATE OR REPLACE JAVA statements - Java parsing is delegated to the PMD Java parser
Add property to the PLDoc ANT task to request inclusion of PLScope call information

release.description: Migrate to new Sourceforge project format
release.action: pom.xml - updated for new source code locations

release.description: Move deployments to Sonatype OSS Maven Repository

release.action: Support multiple labels before global Block
Support "INTO", "USING" and "RETURNING" clauses in "EXECUTE IMMEDIATE" statements
Reduce parsing errors in SQL scripts - cope with (and ignore) SYNONYM, DIRECTORY, DATABASE LINK commands and various otherwise unsupported DDL or access control commands
Support "FORCE" keyword in CREATE OR REPLACE TYPE
Correct parsing of 'NOT NULL' constraint in TYPE and SUBTYPE definitions; allow globalBlocks to be preceded by labels
Schema Summary Page was not a well-formed HTML page
Retrofit skip2NextTokenOccurrence() special token handling from PMD work
Retrofit support for CONTINUE statement (new in 11G) from PMD work
Ensure ANT support for stylesheet and overview parameters
JAVACC: change CHOICE_AMBIGUITY_CHECK from 3 to 2 (the default) - this dramatically speeds up the JAVACC step (back to a few minutes from 90-100-minutes), but may introduce errors
Support "AT LOCAL" and "AT TIME ZONE (DBTIMEZONE|SESSIONTIMEZONE|literal|expression)" time zone clauses
Add SUMMARY element for objects and object level methods in Application.xml- allow relating PL/SCOPE information to methods
Display processed/skipped object counts as pie-chart in the generator page
Add PRECEDES trigger ordering syntax
Support (FORWARD|REVERSE) CROSSEDITION Cross-Edition Trigger syntax
Support remote procedure calls

release.description: Add ignoreInformalComments property to ANT task
release.action: Add ignoreInformalComments property to ANT task
Support datatype across database link

release.description: Allow PLDoc to document Other Database Types
release.action: Add properties to allow the PLDoc ANT tasks to process non-Oracle databases
Allow USING (CHAR_CS|NCHAR_CS) character set specification within arguments
Allow ATTRIBUTE keyword as a name
Allow MAP keyword as a name in body code
Allow others (STATIC|UROWID|VARRAY|VARYING|EXTERNAL|MODIFY|AGGREGATE|OVERRIDING|OID|UNDER|RESULT|FINAL|INSTANTIABLE) unreserved keywords as names in body code
Allow STATIC keyword as a name

Allow these keywords as names in body code (some of which need quoting to compile ...): BULK|BY|BYTE|AT|AUTHID|NCHAR|NVARCHAR2|BFILE|BLOB|CLOB|NCLOB|CLOSE|COLLECT|COMMIT|CURRENT|DEC|DEFINER|DOUBLE|EXTENDS|FUNCTION|HEAP|IMMEDIATE|INDICATOR|INTERVAL|ISOLATION|JAVA|LEVEL|MAX|MIN|MLSLABEL|NATURAL|NUMERIC|OPAQUE|OPEN|ORGANIZATION|PACKAGE|PRECISION|REAL|RETURN|REVERSE|ROLLBACK|ROWID|ROWNUM|SAVEPOINT|SUCCESSFUL|TIMESTAMP
Correct PLDoc usage message on encountering invalid command-line

Experimental- expose PLDoc Resolver, Resources, and parse() method; create net.sourceforge.PLDoc.database.PLDocParser class to define PLDoc parsing within databases- this is an intermediate stage to allowing PL/SQL access to PLDoc parsing
unit.xsl generate method landing page nmes in correct case, rather than lower case

release.description: Allow Document mixed-case generation in PLDOc and ANT task and Minor Bug fixes
release.action: PLDocTask ANT task "namesCase" setting now has 4 options:-"lower" (coerce all names to lower case), "upper" (coerce all names to upper case), "mixed" (all names are left as-is, relying on the coder to ensure that case matches) and "default" (Oracle default: unquoted names are upper case, quoted names are mixed case)
Allow mixed case documentation generation - add this to the command-line "-defaultNamesCase mixed"
Add ResourceResolver to TransformerFactory in order to allow xsl:import and xsl:include
Refactor common XSLT variables and templates into common and common-exslt.xsl
Correct CURSOR documentation generation

release.description: Bug fixes - declare success and release as 1.0.0
release.action: Output PLDoc release version in Generator page
Document Compound Triggers like package bodies
Update POM.XML to use JAVACC Maven plugin 2.6
Support MULTISET operators. "OF" keyword in MULTISET conditions is optional;
Allow SUBTYPE RANGE limits to be negative numbers.
Ignore Java Escape Code Prefix "\u"
XML parsing error when running pldoc in ANT.
Correctly generate deprecated markup in body pages
Generate sample documentation using ISO-8859-15 input encoding to demonstrate national character settings
Generate documentation for PACKAGE and OBJECT TYPE bodies.
ProductionsObjectTypes.jj - parse simplest inherited subtype
Correctly generate deprecated page
Productions.jj - Fix regression where packaged functions and procedures without parameter lists were parsed as fields.
pldoc_ant_example.sh - set pldoc.home Ant property to the script's execution directory
Unit.xsl - sort method and field detail by name

release.description: Add support for database-based PL/SQL to ANT task; update ANT examples for JAVA 5 and above
release.action: Settings.java - add mising setter method required for PLDocTask
PLDoc.java - when called from PLDocTask, redirect in allschemas.xsl showed same problem as unit.xsl had done. Same workaround applied (pass absolute path explicitly as targetFolder XSL parameter)
pom.xml - Filter ANT example batch scripts
pom.xml - Add ANT examples to distribution
Fixed problem with spaces in output directory paths
SQL*Plus commands caused subsequent PL/SQL to be ignored
SQL commands in scripts cause parsing to fail
pom.xml - move reporting info to recommended Maven 3 location ; add mailing list information; added message about approximate duration of JAVACC phase
changes.xml - convert changes.txt to changes.xml
Add ability to skip PLSQL.jj generation (and subsequent unnecessary JavaCC and Javac steps) to pom.xml use "skipJavacc=true" on the command line
file-based integration tests from pldoc_test.sh/pldoc_test.bat
Module HTML pages are now encoded as UTF-8 rather than ISO-8859-1, preventing corruption of module pages
Bundled example scripts now run against bundled samples directory
Site menu link to Sourceforge development site corrected
Maven now creates ZIP, TGZ, and TBZ bundles of JAR files, scripts and sample files
Object/file parsing messages are now suppressed by default: use the new -verbose flag to display them
Site Download menu option now links to download page containing links to JAR files and bundles

release.description: Major external development merged into code tree; project source code moved to Subversion
release.action: PLDoc repository moved to Subversion
Parser supports Collections (see test/TestDoc3/cand2172_tab.html)
Parser supports Object Types (see test/testinput/objecttypes, test/TestDoc3/cand2169_t.html)
Parser supports Schema-level Procedures and Functions(see test/testinput/schemalevel)
Parser supports 11g Triggers (see test/testinput/11g-source, test/TestDoc3/_test_user.html
Parser supports Package and Object Type Bodies
Parser supports Conditional Compilation tokens (see test/TestDoc3/_global.html#prc_conditional)
Parser supports Q-quoted strings (normal cases - see test/TestDoc3/pkg_qstrings.html)
Parser supports Default values (see test/testinput/datetime-source/pkg_datetime_literals.pks, test/TestDoc3/pkg_datetime_literals.html)
Parser supports most unreserved words (see test/TestDoc3/pkg_test_unreserved_keyword.html)
Parser supports split operators, e.g. " 1 ! /* comment ... */ = 2 " (see test/TestDoc3/split_operators.html)
Document schema-level functions and procedures within faux-package of the form "_SCHEMA-NAME"
support @see tags)
inline tags (see test/testinput/objecttypes/TY_FIELD_AGGREGATOR.tps, test/TestDoc3/ty_field_aggregator.html)
Maven now creates 2 artefacts (original JAR and a standalone JAR containing all required classes)
Parse functions based on Java, C libraries
Reuse cursors to prevent MAX_CURSORS exceeded problems
Allow case of identifiers and keywords to be specified (deviating from defaults would require stylesheet rewrite)
Attempt to automatically generate HTML links between objects
Extract metadata using specified SQL92 callable statement (for EnterpriseDB PLDoc generation)
ARRAY keyword
lots of minor fixes
pldoc maven 2 pom has been added, with maven 2 plugin (2.0)
synchronization with central maven repo initiated: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MAVENUPLOAD-2349
cur dir issue, part of the documentation could be generated in a different folder.
in pldoc.bat, pldoc.sh, removed obsolete Oracle jars and added new Oracle Jdbc driver ojdbc14
Oracle classes not necessary for building
SET Causes an error (#1433480)
Use of GLOBAL keyword in a package name (#1464791)
Lexical parser errors are handled like exceptions and will not interrupt the program any longer.
More verbose output added at the end of parsing all packages.
Added some new generator summary tags like creation date.
Added the dummy package _GLOBAL for all global functions.
Added documentation for triggers

Refactored tag handling - linked tags like param, return and throws are are language dependent and those are handled like before. Custom tags like author or deprecated and any other tag the user wishes to have will go under the custom tag node TAG.
XSLT: Added a generator summary page.
XSLT: Now the deprecated and index list work
XSLT: Added triggers to the unit page
XSLT: Refactored the navigation bar
successfully processes all kVASy p411 forms pld's
expression: expression() [<NOT>] <BETWEEN> expression() <AND> expression()
expression: [<NOT>] <IN> ...
expression: [<NOT>] <IN> ... <OR> ...
statement <EXIT> [<WHEN> expression() | <IDENTIFIER>]
statement <END> <LOOP> [<IDENTIFIER>] ";"
expression: <LIKE>
(statement())+ ==> (statement())*
pragma: name=<INTERFACE> "(" <IDENTIFIER> "," <IDENTIFIER> "," numericLiteral() ")"
token: < <SELECT> | <INSERT> | <UPDATE> | <DELETE> | <COMMIT> | <ROLLBACK>> : IN_SQL_STATEMENT_ENDED_SEMICOLON
qualifiedName(), qualifiedID(), unqualifiedID()
much more ...
added support for generating documentation from the Oracle dictionary (Oracle 9i or above).
improved format of the HTML output:
changed index.xsl to create the 3-frame view (as in normal javadoc)
added output for schema overview in upper left frame
changed output for list view in lower left frame
added overviews/summaries
corrected the suggested CVSROOT in readme.txt
Error using a doctitle other than "Sample Application" (#999222)
Error when parameter is DEFAULT (2) (#1028068)
use single quotes in pldoc_example.bat (to work on Windows XP)
Initial support for parsing tables and views (only simpler cases yet)
In application.xml, use <TAG type="@deprecated"> instead of <DEPRECATED> and <TAG type="@throws""> instead of <THROWS"> (code submitted by Steve Holt)
Keyword PIPELINED unknown (#939294)
invocation of pldoc.bat fails when pldoc is installed into directory with spaces in the path (#876225)
Runtime/command line parameter to skip unparsable files (#832509)
Corrected name extracting for multiple-word datatypes (like LONG RAW and REF CURSOR)
Unable to use timestamp with time zone data type (#971941)
Ant task (#769012)
all source files moved to src directory
build-related files moved to build directory
pldoc.jar now contains also *.xsl, *.css and *.dtd files
lower case pragma causes error (#827062)
dumps on reserved word DETERMINISTIC (#711093)
NULL modifier in the COLUMN definition (#831256)
Xalan jars upgraded from version 2.2.D14 to 2.5.1
option -inputencoding to specify character encodings of input files
show types defined in package spec (#638551)
Better anchors (#650466)
Align func/proc parameters by the first (#650501)
Add a command line options to control case convertion (#771453)
documentation typo (#731017)
PLDoc does not work on JDK below 1.3 (#751296)
VARRAY bug (#765345)
parameter mode (OUT, IN OUT) not shown (#804634)
show DEFAULT value for parameters (#809871)
Implemented: Package comments more conveniently (#644050)
Implemented: make documentation part of the distribution (#692488)
Implemented: Beginner Drag-and-drop (#696678)
Implemented: Support SQL*Plus substitution variables (#723291)
-doctitle option and sentence argument (#663581)
Parser fails if: "end; -- end package" (#700040)
Procedure w/o params appears as variable (#643043)
Wrong api gen for overloaded procedures (#652703)
Field Details not generated (#653029)
CRLF removed from overview document (#653408)
The first sentence extraction incorrect (#654037)
Implemented: The classes should be in packages (#643037)
Implemented: Change license to LGPL (#647744)
Implemented: Do not sort field/method details section (#654036)
Enhanced: classes packed into pldoc.jar
Enhanced: show PLDoc version number
Allow multiple @throws like @param (#637931)
error parsing REF object_type
Implemented: Support 9iR2 assoc array index types (#592444)
Implemented: Treat constants in package spec as field (#556039)
Enhanced: run pldoc from any directory (thanks to Kim Jersin)
Enhanced: show fully qualified names of datatypes
@deprecated of function makes pack. deprecated (#594662)
@param MUST be followed by ONE space (#594668)
Space missing in output when joining lines (#595625)
Enhanced: now using Ant for building
@throws tag support in function/procedure comments
@deprecated tag support in package/function/procedure comments
parsing prefixed function calls
bug causing IndexOutOfBoundsException when parsing comments
allow HTML in @return description
in samples, @headcom tag moved to the end of comment
in formal comments, tags section must be after the main text, not before
declaration Java stored procedures can be parsed
Use and Package links
* Enhanced: parameter names are shown in lowercase
@param description may span on the next line
strings may contain whatever symbols except closing quote
cursors can now be parsed in package specs
some simple Java stored procedure callspecs can be parsed
lowercase procedures did not show up
error when overview file not specified
quoted identifier support
parsing mixed-type expressions
parsing REF CURSOR declarations
allow < and > in informal comments
package name can be reserved word
added date expressions
variable names in expressions can have dot inside
-overview option, allows to specify file with summary text
UNIX shell scripts make.sh and pldoc.sh
Record types supported
All expressions (boolean, numeric, character, date) supported
Allows to specify the output directory
Custom stylesheet file can be used (using the -stylesheetfile option)
Copies stylesheet.css the output directory
